mapper.select: SELECT io_id, io_num, m.ma_id, m.ma_num, m.ma_name, c.clt_id, c.clt_num, c.clt_name, i.io_cnt, i.io_unit, m.ma_price, i.io_date, i.io_state, i.rec_date, i.emp_id, i.io_reg_date, i.io_update_date, i.update_emp_id, CASE WHEN i.update_emp_id IS NULL THEN (SELECT emp_name FROM employee WHERE emp_id = i.emp_id) ELSE (SELECT emp_name FROM employee WHERE emp_id = i.update_emp_id) END AS emp_name FROM in_order i JOIN employee e ON i.emp_id = e.emp_id JOIN material m ON i.ma_id = m.ma_id JOIN client c ON i.clt_id = c.clt_id ORDER BY io_id DESC LIMIT #{startPage}, #{pageSize}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO in_order (io_num, ma_id, clt_id, io_cnt, io_unit, io_amount, io_date, io_state, rec_date, io_reg_date, emp_id) SELECT CONCAT(SUBSTRING(io_num, 1, 2), LPAD(max(io_id) + 1, 6, '0')), #{ma_id}, #{clt_id}, #{io_cnt}, #{io_unit}, #{ma_price}*#{io_cnt}, now(), #{io_state}, #{rec_date}, now(), #{emp_id} FROM in_order WHERE io_num LIKE CONCAT('%', 'IO', '%');
mapper.select: SELECT count(io_id) FROM in_order i JOIN employee e ON i.emp_id = e.emp_id JOIN material m ON i.ma_id = m.ma_id JOIN client c ON i.clt_id = c.clt_id

SELECT i.io_num, c.clt_num, c.clt_name, c.clt_rep, c.clt_tel, c.clt_adr, c.clt_post, c.clt_email, m.ma_num, m.ma_name, m.ma_price, i.io_cnt, i.io_unit, m.ma_price, i.io_date, i.rec_date, e.emp_name FROM in_order i JOIN client c ON i.clt_id = c.clt_id JOIN material m ON i.ma_id = m.ma_id JOIN employee e ON i.emp_id = e.emp_id WHERE i.io_id = #{io_id};

SELECT DATE_FORMAT(io_date, '%Y-%m') AS month, COUNT(*) monthlyIOCount, SUM(m.ma_price*i.io_cnt) AS monthlyIOAmount FROM in_order i JOIN material m ON i.ma_id = m.ma_id GROUP BY DATE_FORMAT(io_date, '%Y-%m') ORDER BY month

SELECT io_id, io_num, m.ma_id, m.ma_num, m.ma_name, c.clt_id, c.clt_num, c.clt_name, i.io_cnt, i.io_unit, m.ma_price, i.io_date, i.io_state, i.rec_date, i.emp_id, i.io_reg_date, i.io_update_date, i.update_emp_id, CASE WHEN i.update_emp_id IS NULL THEN (SELECT emp_name FROM employee WHERE emp_id = i.emp_id) ELSE (SELECT emp_name FROM employee WHERE emp_id = i.update_emp_id) END AS emp_name FROM in_order i JOIN employee e ON i.emp_id = e.emp_id JOIN material m ON i.ma_id = m.ma_id JOIN client c ON i.clt_id = c.clt_id WHERE io_state = '완료' ORDER BY io_id DESC LIMIT #{startPage}, #{pageSize}
